study experience research about

Why choose Victoria

At Victoria, you’ll be pushed to think independently and inspired to succeed. Be part of our diverse and friendly community in the thriving capital. Let our students tell you what sets Victoria apart.

Know your next move

  • Course planning
  • Book a campus tour
  • Sign up for updates

Know your next move

  • Course planning appointments

    If you need help deciding what degree might be right for you, or what courses to take, book a course planning session with us.

  • Book a campus tour

    Get a taste of what life at Victoria is like—book a campus tour and check out our student accommodation while you are here.

  • School visits

    We're visiting schools throughout the year. For your introduction to Victoria, find out when we're in your region.

Meet our students

  • Student Name

    Degree

    Doing the BA Internship at Te Papa made me see how I could put my arts papers into practice through real life work experience.

  • Student Name

    Degree

    Design has given me a different perspective. It’s challenged my thinking and I’ve learnt to form my own opinions and creative ideas.

  • Student Name

    Degree

    You're surrounded by people who are encouraging and inspiring you to think deeply and outside of yourself.
